Name: bleeding-wound
name: Bleeding Wound
description: Applies Bleed on hit to a single enemy.

Name: windstep-boon
name: Windstep Boon
description: Applies Haste to improve movement and attack speed.

Name: mana-tide
name: Mana Tide
description: Applies Mana Surge to improve mana sustain.

Name: weakening-hex
name: Weakening Hex
description: Applies Weakened to reduce outgoing damage.

Name: barrier-ward
name: Barrier Ward
description: Applies Barrier when taking damage to blunt burst hits.

Name: sharpened-edge
name: Sharpened Edge
description: Passive edge tuning that increases offensive scaling.
